pullRequest.title: Hexmap
pullRequest.bodyText:
provides a browser-based navigable svg map with improved rendering of relations/paths
adresses #62

commit.message: [#1] added hal support (spring hateos 1.0.0 did not work)
Merge branch 'hexmap' of github.com:bonndan/nivio into hexmap
new method to get group color
mapitem with identifier as name fallback
fix to provide icon urls to map items
map group items have hex start/end coords
link to app/map in landscape hateoas, map moved to subdirectory
showing details under labels on click
showing group names and landscape name

nodes.bodyText: Maybe there is a better, more readable approach to this than doing the calculations within the JSX?
Is this correct or was it supposed to be named NHexagon?
You should really run Reformat Code on this file (Ctrl+Alt+L). 🙃 Loads of missing spaces.
Why do you import Rendered, Icon, IconService and LocalServer specifically if you already import de.bonndan.nivio.output.*?
Can't you extract this into a method (using some kind of Point)? It get's repeated in lines 93-102.
Move static fields to the top of the class.

commit.message: [#79] removed hex stuff calculation from java, now done in react
